0010000101010010 1001010111110111 1 -> sum: 1011011101001010, cout: 0
0010110111001100 0000001000001100 0 -> sum: 0010111111011000, cout: 0
0000010001000010 1101011100010010 1 -> sum: 1101101101010101, cout: 0

0100001111110101 1011000110111011 1 -> sum: 1111010110110001, cout: 0
0010011110011101 0111000011101111 0 -> sum: 1001100010001100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
